## 🙋‍♂️ About Me

- 🏫 I'm Vidit Kushwaha, final year student, doing my bachelors of technology in Metallurgical & Materials Engineering from NIT Rourkela.
- 💬 Ask me about **Web Development**, **Machine Learning**
- 🎥 I’m building next: No Idea.
- 👯 I’m looking to collaborate on **OpenSource Projects**
